narrative:
This was a focused inspection on the veterinary care non-compliances reported on the January 6, 2016, inspection.
Two of the animals cited on that report were examined by a veterinarian and are currently on a treatment regimen. 
The third animal is no longer on the premises.
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
